name: The Adventure of Frogboy & Crocodude
description:
Made for the Brackeys game jam 2022.2

Graphics inspired by Noel Berry's Tiny Link project.

Music from opengameart.org by Matthew Polo

Only Crocodude can attack, and only Frogboy can climb and wall-jump.

Gamepad Controls:

Switch character - Y
Move - D-pad/Left stick
Jump - A
Attack - X
Climb walls - RT

Gamepad Controls:

Switch character - I
Move - WASD
Jump - W
Attack - J
Climb walls - K
